testcase.name: User wants to confirm purchase - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser.....................................................passed And login into the website..................................................passed And buy some items..........................................................passed And user goes to the shoping cart...........................................passed When user click checkout button.............................................passed And user type name1, surname1 and 1718......................................passed And click continue button...................................................passed Then user is available to see the total price...............................passed And click the final button, the purchase will be done and the programm will say Thank you for your order!.passed
